official_title: To direct the Commandant of the Coast Guard to convey certain property in Sault Sainte Marie, Michigan, to the local American Legion Post.

summary.text: Directs the Commandant of the Coast Guard to convey to American Legion Post No. 3 specified property in Sault Sainte Marie, Michigan, to be used as a clubhouse.

titles.title: To direct the Commandant of the Coast Guard to convey certain property in Sault Sainte Marie, Michigan, to the local American Legion Post.
